strapiJob.title: Radiology Reading Room Assistant
strapiJob.description: Assist RAPA Radiologists and support clinical staff with all tasks necessary to maintain efficiency of physician time and radiology study workflow. Call reports to referring physicians, emergency rooms, and hospitals as well as answering phones in the reading room, screening calls, prioritizing calls and requests, and coordinating responses with the Radiologists. Organize images and electronic and paper documents in order to expedite reading and dictation by the Radiologists. Serve as liaison between hospital personnel and RAPA physicians, administration, and business office staff as needed.
